longBusinessSummary: The fund invests primarily in common stocks. It normally invests at least 80% of assets in securities principally traded on NASDAQ® or an over-the-counter (OTC) market, which has more small and medium-sized companies than other markets. The fund invests more than 25% of total assets in the technology sector. It invests in domestic and foreign issuers. The fund invests in either "growth" stocks or "value" stocks or both. It is non-diversified.
